title: 12/07/20 HOUR 2- Chris Simms
itunes:title: 12/07/20 HOUR 2- Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms Tells Dan the the NFL MVP race is a two man race and he is bias to Rodgers over Mahomes. Chris and Dan ponder what Rodgers would look like in the KC offense.
